main.name: Nasir Ruslan
main.description: I am a full stack developer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume that I created. This is the home page or resume page
main.bio: I am an aspiring full stack developer that am currently attending the Coder Academy Web Development Bootcamp. I have a great passion for all things programming, but am no stranger on the development front as well. I am fully committed and am very passionate about what I do. In my free time, I love to game, create and upload video shorts on Youtube and TitTok and play with my cat. I love the outdoors and always love the opportunity to go hiking whenever possible.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: Coder Academy Full Stack Web Developer Bootcamp
education.description: I have just started this bootcamp 2 weeks ago, but already I have picked up useful web development skills such as C++ with Terminal, Markdown, webframing using Figma, HTML, CSS, SCSS, Git. There are many other more exciting modules that I will be learning in the next few weeks, including web deployment using Netlify.
This course has equipped me with all the updated and relevant knowledge regarding AWS fundamentals such as EC2, ELB, ASG, RDS, ElastiCache, S3, Route53, Cloudfront and other fundamentals.

education.degree: Bachelor of Biomedical Science, majoring in Cell and Molecular Biology
education.description: This course covers the fundamentals of Biomedial Science, including fields of Haematology, Microbiology, Biochemistry, Immunology and Histology. All these fields allow me to pursue a career in the medical science field, such as a pathologist, medical technologist or medical scientist.

work.title: Junior bug fixer
